name: @yoonit/nativescript-handshake
description: The dynamic SSL pinning NativeScript module for Android and iOS

scripts.tsc: npm i && npm run setup && tsc
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build:native
scripts.demo:reset: cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm i
scripts.plugin:prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin add ../src && tns plugin remove nativescript-yoonit-handshake && npm i && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo:reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules && npm i

author.name: Luigui Delyer, Gabriel Rizzo, Haroldo Teruya & Victor Goulart @ Cyberlabs AI - 2020-2021
